basics.name: Evie Snuggle
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am an incredibly passionate enthusiast about everything related to tech, I live tech, it's part of my daily life! I get genuinely so excited about both producing, experimenting with and testing out new technologies, it's thrilling to see new ideas shape the world and people's lives in a completely new way, for the better.I would call myself an avid learner, with a burning desire to understand how things work from every level of its implementation. I spend hours each day fully-immersed in tech including thousands of small personal projects from making my own cloud-storage server with AWS S3-style Object Storage, spontaneous and inventive ideas such as hosting a Steam library over iSCSI using ZFS w/deduplication over a small peer-to-peer Thunderbolt 3 network, to just living and breathing the stuff every day. I'm here for the new experiences, to learn and to grow as a person and to be able to work towards the best I can do, with code and projects that I can be proud of.

education.gpa: Achieved Grade 'A' GCSEs in Mathematics and Information Technology and Achieved Grade 'B' GCSEs in English, Computer Science, Biology, Chemistry & Physics.

keywords: Years of Experience Using Linux Daily
skills.name: Linux

work.summary: As a part-time role alongside my studies, I teach 1st Year students and aid their learning by providing implementations of code, demonstrating them, answering student's questions, teach programming concepts by-example and running through them piece-by-piece in sessions throughout seminars. I was offered this role after achieving a 97% grade in my own programming module and demonstrating the ability to teach.

During these two weeks of arranged work experience with Bryan's Data Programming, I learnt how to repair complicated devices ranging from repairing the display of Apple iPads to taking apart to diagnosing faulty computers using proper troubleshooting methods and the process of elimination.
